html._title: The Wedding of Monica and Jack
html._about_header: We would like to invite you to participate in our wedding ceremony.
html._about_lead: We want to share this special day with people closest to us.
html._service_desc_1: The wedding lithurgy will take place in St Paul's Church in New Jersey.
html._service_desc_2: The wedding party will take place in Plaza Hotel in New York.
html._service_desc_3: All guests will be accommodated in the Plaza Hotel apartments.
html._service_desc_4: If on this day you planned to offer us gifts of flowers, we would be equally happy for charity donations instead.
